name: smite
description: Zero-debt engineering with unified development workflow. Features 4-plugin architecture (core, studio, agents, essentials) with 4-flag composable system, specialized development agents by domain, and parallel execution (2-3x speedup).

metadata.description: SMITE v1.6.5 - 4-plugin architecture: Core (infrastructure/ reorganized), Studio (build + refactor focused), Agents (8 specialized agents by domain), Essentials (productivity + git integration). Agent discovery system via --tech flag.

plugins.name: core
plugins.description: Complete core infrastructure reorganized with infrastructure/ directory (templates, validation, platform, parallel, docs). ConfigManager, HookRegistry, SchemaValidator, PlatformDetector, TemplateEngine, Logger, ErrorHandler, ManifestLoader. Removed: adversarial, learning, teaching, data modes.

plugins.name: studio
plugins.description: Unified development workflow - build, refactor. 4-flag implementation system (speed, scale, quality, team) with auto-detection and composable flags. Systematic refactoring with validation. Removed: explore (use semantic search), architect (moved to agents plugin).

plugins.name: agents
plugins.description: 8 specialized development agents organized by domain: Frontend (nextjs, vitejs, react-native), Backend (rust, nestjs, route-api), Database (prisma), DevOps (docker), Optimization (performance, seo, optimization). Agent discovery system via --tech flag for automatic selection or --agent flag for manual selection.

plugins.name: essentials
plugins.description: Productivity utilities - automatic session renaming with LLM-based context analysis, cross-platform shell aliases (cc, ccc), and lightweight git workflow integration. Smart session naming based on context with customizable triggers and filters. Git integration generates smart commands based on SMITE 4-flag system.
